_header: Guile and gold together arn met
_description: Of covetous guile — five quatrains and burden: ‘Now go gyle gyle gyle / Now go gile gyle go’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Gyle & gold togedere arn metCouetyse be hym is
                    set…
BLSl2593.Last Lines: …He that made al mankyndeAmend hem that mys han do
